conbody.p: processorsList PivoterList PivoteroverviewThe List Pivoter pivots data in a list field and creates a record for each item in the list.
The List Pivoter processor pivots the data in one field.

When you configure the List Pivoter, you specify the list field to pivot and where to write the pivoted data. By default, the processor writes the pivoted data to the original list field, but you can specify another field for the data.
You can also specify whether to include the existing fields in the resulting records and configure the action to take when the list field does not exist.
